title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Marcus Thompson on Harden/Simmons Trade, KD Regrets, Klay's Comeback, Lakers Desperation, Zion Bust Watch
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Marcus Thompson on Harden/Simmons Trade, KD Regrets, Klay's Comeback, Lakers Desperation, Zion Bust Watch
description:
First, it's Fake Questions, Real Answers where Colin explains what massive Super Bowl ratings - despite two smaller brands - means for the league, if insane Super Bowl ticket prices are a real concern, what most people are missing about Jim Harbaugh's new Michigan contract, and the biggest takeaway from Aaron Rodgers most recent tabloid break up (3:00). Then, The Athletic NBA Writer Marcus Thompson joins Colin to discuss what flaw could prevent the Warriors from winning the West (11:00), if Klay Thompson can regain his pre-injury level of play (13:00), when the Warriors were convinced Andrew Wiggins was a building block instead of a trade piece (15:00), if Jonathan Kuminga can contribute in the playoffs (21:00), if KD has regrets about his decision to leave the Warriors (25:00), if Ben Simmons can fit in with KD and Kyrie (26:00), if James Harden makes the Sixers legitimate contenders in the East (28:00), the quickest way for the struggling Lakers to rebuild (30:00), if the Suns should be the title favorite (33:00), if the Bulls are overvalued by the media (38:00), if the Knicks are the latest team to get burnt out on Tom Thibodeau (40:00), and if Zion Williamson is on the verge of being considered a bust (45:00)

Subscribe NOW and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
